00033         public class Smartlists
00034         {
00035                 private List<Query> smartlists = new List<Query>();
00036                 
00041                 public Query this[string name]
00042                 {
00043                         get
00044                         {
00045                                 foreach (Query q in smartlists)
00046                                 {
00047                                         if (name == q.name)
00048                                         {
00049                                                 return q;
00050                                         }
00051                                 }
00052                                 return null;
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055 
00060                 public void setSmartlist(Query query)
00061                 {
00062                         foreach (Query q in smartlists)
00063                         {
00064                                 if (query.name == q.name)
00065                                 {
00066                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Replaced query with name " + q.name + " with newer version");
00067                                         smartlists.Remove(q);
00068                                         break;
00069                                 }
00070                         }
00071 
00072                         smartlists.Add(query);
00073                 }
00074 
00079                 public void removeSmartlist(Query query)
00080                 {
00081                         foreach (Query q in smartlists)
00082                         {
00083                                 if (query.name == q.name)
00084                                 {
00085                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Deleted query with name " + q.name);
00086                                         smartlists.Remove(q);
00087                                         break;
00088                                 }
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091 
00095                 public Query[] Items
00096                 {
00097                         get
00098                         {
00099                                 return smartlists.ToArray();
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102         }

00136         [XmlRoot("mediaDB")]
00137         public sealed class MediaDB
00138         {
00139                 static readonly MediaDB instance = MediaDB.bootstrapMediaDB();
00140                 static private string xmlLocation;
00141 
00142                 private List<string> watchFolders = new List<string>();
00143                 private List<string> mediaExtensions = new List<string>();
00144                 private List<string> playlistExtensions = new List<string>();
00145 
00146                 [XmlElement("media")]
00147                 public List<Media> mediaList = new List<Media>();
00148                 public Smartlists smartlists = new Smartlists();
00149                 [XmlIgnore]
00150                 public List<PlaylistFile> playlists = new List<PlaylistFile>();
00151 
00152                 private enum MDBAction
00153                 {
00154                         Add,
00155                         Replace,
00156                         Skip
00157                 }
00158 
00159                 static MediaDB()
00160                 {
00161                 }
00162 
00168                 static MediaDB bootstrapMediaDB()
00169                 {
00170                         MediaDB mdb;
00171                         MediaDB.xmlLocation = Program.MusicPath + @"\crossfade.xml";
00172 
00173                         if (!File.Exists(MediaDB.xmlLocation))
00174                         {
00175                                 mdb = new MediaDB();
00176                         }
00177                         else
00178                         {
00179                                 TextReader sr = null;
00180                                 try
00181                                 {
00182                                         sr = new StreamReader(xmlLocation);
00183                                         mdb = (MediaDB)(new XmlSerializer(typeof(MediaDB)).Deserialize(sr));
00184                                         sr.Close();
00185                                 }
00186                                 catch (InvalidOperationException)
00187                                 {
00188                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Could not load persistent media database, rebuilding ...");
00189                                         mdb = new MediaDB();
00190                                 }
00191                                 finally
00192                                 {
00193                                         if (sr != null) sr.Close();
00194                                 }
00195                         }
00196 
00197                         return mdb;
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 public static MediaDB Instance
00201                 {
00202                         get
00203                         {
00204                                 return instance;
00205                         }
00206                 }
00207 
00208 
00212                 public void bootstrap()
00213                 {
00214                         rebuild();
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 MediaDB()
00218                 {
00222                         mediaExtensions.Add(".mp3");
00223                         mediaExtensions.Add(".ogg");
00224                         mediaExtensions.Add(".flac");
00225                         mediaExtensions.Add(".wma");
00226                         mediaExtensions.Add(".png");
00227                         mediaExtensions.Add(".jpg");
00228                         mediaExtensions.Add(".gif");
00229                         mediaExtensions.Add(".flac");
00230                         mediaExtensions.Add(".avi");
00231                         mediaExtensions.Add(".mpg");
00232                         mediaExtensions.Add(".ogm");
00233                         mediaExtensions.Add(".mkv");
00234                         mediaExtensions.Add(".wmv");
00235                         mediaExtensions.Add(".asf");
00236                         playlistExtensions.Add(".m3u");
00237 
00241                         addFolder(Program.MusicPath);
00242                 }
00243 
00247                 public void commit()
00248                 {
00249                         XmlSerializer s = new XmlSerializer(typeof(MediaDB));
00250                         TextWriter w = new StreamWriter(xmlLocation);
00251                         s.Serialize(w, this);
00252                         w.Close();
00253                 }
00254 
00260                 private void addFile(Media media)
00261                 {
00262                         MDBAction add;
00263                         Media mInDB = null;
00264 
00265                         if (media.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00266                         {
00267                                 System.IO.FileInfo fi = new System.IO.FileInfo(media.uri.LocalPath);
00268 
00269                                 foreach (Media m in mediaList)
00270                                 {
00271                                         if (m.uri == media.uri)
00272                                         {
00273                                                 // File already in mediaDB
00274                                                 System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Already in MDB: " + media.uri);
00275                                                 mInDB = m;
00276                                                 break;
00277                                         }
00278                                         //else if (m.SHA1Sum == media.SHA1Sum)
00279                                         //{
00280                                         //    // Duplicate file
00281                                         //    System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Duplicate file: " + media.uri + " vs. " + m.uri);
00282                                         //}
00283                                 }
00284 
00285                                 if (mInDB == null)
00286                                 {
00287                                         // If it's not in the database, then it should get added
00288                                         add = MDBAction.Add;
00289                                 }
00290                                 else
00291                                 {
00292                                         // Check the date of last modification
00293                                         if (fi.LastWriteTime != mInDB.MTime)
00294                                         {
00295                                                 // It's been modified since our last indexing, replace the old version
00296                                                 add = MDBAction.Replace;
00297                                         }
00298                                         else
00299                                         {
00300                                                 // It's the same file, we can keep the information we already have in the database
00301                                                 add = MDBAction.Skip;
00302                                         }
00303                                 }
00304                         }
00305                         else
00306                         {
00307                                 /* not-file:/-URIs don't have a modification date, so we add it, if it's not in the database, and keep the version in the database, if the same URI already
00308                                  * exists in the MediaDB */
00309                                 foreach (Media m in mediaList)
00310                                 {
00311                                         if (m.uri == media.uri)
00312                                         {
00313                                                 add = MDBAction.Skip;
00314                                                 break;
00315                                         }
00316                                 }
00317 
00318                                 add = MDBAction.Add;
00319                         }
00320 
00321                         switch (add)
00322                         {
00323                                 case MDBAction.Add:
00324                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Adding media: " + media.uri);
00325                                         mediaList.Add(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(media));
00326                                         break;
00327                                 case MDBAction.Replace:
00328                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Replacing media: " + media.uri);
00329                                         mediaList.Remove(mInDB);
00330                                         mediaList.Add(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(media));
00331                                         break;
00332                                 case MDBAction.Skip:
00333                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Skipping media: " + media.uri);
00334                                         break;
00335                         }
00336                         gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(1);
00337                 }
00338 
00339                 private void addFolder(string folder)
00340                 {
00341                         watchFolders.Add(folder);
00342                 }
00343 
00349                 public void rebuild()
00350                 {
00351                         /* Löschen von Dateien aus der Mediendatenbank, die nicht mehr existieren */
00352                         for (int i = mediaList.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00353                         {
00354                                 Media m = mediaList[i];
00355 
00356                                 if (m.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00357                                 {
00358                                         if (!File.Exists(m.uri.LocalPath)) mediaList.RemoveAt(i);
00359                                 }
00360                         }
00361 
00362                         /* watchFolders nach neuen Mediendateien durchsuchen */
00363                         foreach (string folder in watchFolders)
00364                         {
00365                                 if (Directory.Exists(folder))
00366                                 {
00367                                         foreach (string file in System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(folder, "*", SearchOption.AllDirectories))
00368                                         {
00369                                                 System.IO.FileInfo fi = new System.IO.FileInfo(file);
00370 
00371                                                 if (mediaExtensions.Contains(fi.Extension.ToLower()))
00372                                                 {
00373                                                         addFile(new Media(new Uri(fi.FullName)));
00374                                                 }
00375                                                 else if (playlistExtensions.Contains(fi.Extension.ToLower()))
00376                                                 {
00377                                                         playlists.Add(new PlaylistFile(new Uri(fi.FullName)));
00378                                                 }
00379                                         }
00380                                 }
00381                         }
00382                 }
00383 
00389                 public Media HashToMedia(string hash)
00390                 {
00391                         foreach (Media m in mediaList)
00392                         {
00393                                 if (m.SHA1Sum == hash) return m;
00394                         }
00395 
00396                         return null;
00397                 }
00398         }

00674                                 }

00681                 [XmlIgnore]
00682                 public Stream Cover
00683                 {
00684                         get
00685                         {
00686                                 if (uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00687                                 {
00688                                         if (Type == MediaType.Audio && !uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".cda"))
00689                                         {
00690                                                 LibraryTagLib tl = new LibraryTagLib(uri);
00691                                                 return tl.Cover;
00692                                         }
00693                                         else
00694                                                 return null;
00695                                 }
00696                                 else
00697                                         return null;
00698                         }
00699                         set
00700                         {
00701                                 // We need to remember the current media object and the position ...
00702                                 Media akt_media = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00703                                 float last_position = 0;
00704 
00705                                 if (akt_media != null && akt_media.uri == this.uri)
00706                                 {
00707                                         last_position = Player.Instance.Position;
00708 
00709                                         // So we can stop the player to update the tag (thank you Windows) ...
00710                                         Player.Instance.stop();
00711                                 }
00712 
00713                                 LibraryTagLib tl = new LibraryTagLib(uri);
00714 
00715                                 tl.Cover = value;
00716                                 tl.save();
00717 
00718 
00719                                 if (akt_media != null && akt_media.uri == this.uri)
00720                                 {
00721                                         // and immediately re-open the media object and return to the last position, so playback continues with only a minimal gap.
00722                                         Player.Instance.open(ref akt_media);
00723                                         Player.Instance.play();
00724                                         Player.Instance.Position = last_position;
00725                                 }
00726                         }
00727                 }
00728 
00732                 public enum MediaType
00733                 {
00734                         Audio,
00735                         Picture,
00736                         Video,
00737                         Unknown
00738                 }
00739 
00743                 [XmlIgnore]
00744                 public MediaType Type
00745                 {
00746                         get
00747                         {
00748                                 if (uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".mp3") ||
00749                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".wav") ||
00750                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".ogg") ||
00751                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".flac") ||
00752                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".cda") ||
00753                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".wma"))
00754                                         return MediaType.Audio;
00755                                 else if (uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".png") ||
00756                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".jpg") ||
00757                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".gif") ||
00758                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".flac"))
00759                                         return MediaType.Picture;
00760                                 else if (uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".avi") ||
00761                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".mpg") ||
00762                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".ogm") ||
00763                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".mkv") ||
00764                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".wmv") ||
00765                                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".asf"))
00766                                         return MediaType.Video;
00767                                 else return MediaType.Unknown;
00768                         }
00769                 }
00770 
00771                 public Media()
00772                 {
00773                         Length = -1;
00774                 }
00775 
00776                 public Media(Uri uri)
00777                 {
00778                         this.uri = uri;
00779                         Length = -1;
00780                 }
00781 
00786                 public void commitToTag()
00787                 {
00788                         if (this.uri.Scheme != Uri.UriSchemeFile) return;
00789 
00790                         Media akt_media = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00791                         float last_position = 0;
00792 
00793                         bool wasPlayling = Player.Instance.isPlaying;
00794                         if (akt_media != null && akt_media.uri == this.uri && Player.Instance.isPlaying)
00795                         {
00796                                 last_position = Player.Instance.Position;
00797                                 Player.Instance.stop();
00798                         }
00799                         try
00800                         {
00801                                 LibraryTagLib tl = new LibraryTagLib(this.uri);
00802                                 tl.Tracknr = this.TrackNr;
00803                                 tl.Title = this.Title;
00804                                 tl.Album = this.Album;
00805                                 tl.Artist = this.Artist;
00806                                 tl.Year = this.Year;
00807                                 tl.Genre = this.Genre;
00808                                 tl.Comment = this.Comment;
00809                                 tl.Composer = this.Composer;
00810                                 tl.Copyright = this.Copyright;
00811                                 tl.Rating = this.Rating;
00812                                 tl.save();
00813                         }
00814                         catch (IOException ex)
00815                         {
00816                                 throw ex;
00817                         }
00818 
00819                         if (akt_media != null && akt_media.uri == this.uri && wasPlayling)
00820                         {
00821                                 Player.Instance.open(ref akt_media);
00822                                 Player.Instance.play();
00823                                 Player.Instance.Position = last_position;
00824                         }
00825                 }
00826         }
